title: One dead in southwest Denver shooting; suspect in custody
content:
You need to have the Adobe Flash Player to view this content. Please click here to continue.
DENVER -- Police are investigating a deadly shooting in southwest Denver on Monday night.
The Denver Police Department said the victim was transported to a hospital and later said the person died. One suspect was taken into custody.
The shooting happened in the 3000 block of West Colorado Avenue after 6 p.m.
The identity of the victim and suspect have not been released.
